description:
First, family, friends, and fellow racing drivers have paid tribute to Jules Bianchi at his funeral in his hometown Nice in France. There were solemn applause as the family took the casket inside the cathedral, where the funeral took place. Bianchi died on Friday night, nine months after suffering head injury sustained in a crash at the Japanese Grand Prix. He was the first driver to die of an injury sustained in an F1 race since Ayrton Senna in 1994. Among those at the funeral was the French Formula One journalist Daniel Rotelli who knew Jules well.

"It was a fitting funeral because it was a beautiful ceremony, and because all sorts of drivers were here: young drivers, older drivers, current drivers. I didn't suspect we would see as many drivers three days before the Grand Prix. Everybody was crying, everybody was very moved, and I have to say it was a sad sad sad day, and it was also a beautiful ceremony, because the image of Jules in that ceremony was simple, it was modest, it was very strong, and it was just like him. He was 25 and he didn't have the best car by far length, but he never complained and he was always positive about what he was experiencing."

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

贾斯汀·比伯（英语：Justin Bieber，1994年3月1日－），加拿大歌手。早期因为在YouTube翻唱其他人的歌曲而出名，为亚瑟小子所赏识，与小岛唱片签约，居住在美国洛杉矶，并于2009年11月17日发行他的第一张专辑《MY WORLDS》的第一部分《MY WORLD》。 截止发行后第五周，该唱片已在美国售出百万张，并在加拿大被认证为白金唱片。专辑的第二部分《MY WORLD 2.0》，于2010年3月发行，亦获得不错的商业成绩。
Pray这首歌是17岁少年偶像Justin Bieber的第一首公益歌曲。这首歌被收录到他的不插电专辑《My Worlds Acoustic》中。也是《My Worlds Acoustic》专辑中唯一的新歌。贾斯汀比伯说他创作新歌《祈祷》（Pray）时，受到了MJ的歌曲《镜中人》（Man in the Mirror）的启发。Bieber说，“我在写这首歌时，想到了迈克尔的《镜中人》。有很多关于爱情的歌曲，我想创作这个主题以外的歌曲是很棒的。还有很多其他重要的事情，我想能够激励大家。”

 

讲解：

I just can't sleep tonight
Knowing the things ain't right
It's in the papers, It's on the tv
It's everywhere that I go

Children are crying
SoldIers are dying
Some people don't have a home

But I know there's sunshine behind that rain
I know there's good times behind that pain, hey.
Can you tell me how I can make a change?

I close my eyes and I can see a better day
I close my eyes and pray
I close my eyes and I could see a better day
I close my eyes and pray

I lose my appetite
No way could start tonight
Am I a singer?
Cause of my dinner
Still laying on my plate
Oohh I got a vision, to make a difference
And I start it today

Cause I know there's sunshine behind that rain
I know there's good times behind that pain

I pray for the broken hearted
I pray for the life not started
I pray for all amongst not breathing
I pray for all the souls in needing,
Pray, can you give 'em one a day
I just can't sleep tonight
